titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the Traverse City Area Public School District for demolition and removal of a structure at former Coast Guard property located in Traverse City, Michigan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 4/5/2000--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to make a grant to the Traverse City Area Public School District for the demolition and removal of Building 402 at former Coast Guard property located in Traverse City, Michigan.
